title: Were the 50's a time of conformity? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Very much so, Truman indicted laws to spread US ideology, and silence the communist opposition in the US. Even going so far as to arrest people for even hinting at support of a communist United States. In short, that freedom of speech we all love so much was kind of shut down in the 50s. Conform or die sort of environment.
